Perceptor:

Perceptor followed her and said "I love that you liked my master 
art, by now" hissed the male"Why don't you test your new weaponry 
while you train with Blackstorm... "


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/21/03 10:44:59 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > The prosces finished and the new beast form as the new upgrades 
had 
> > done.
> > 
> > Perceptor smiled and typed some buttons more and the Machine 
turn 
> > off, Perceptor took Maxima in arms and left her in a table. He 
> > patiently waited that she woke up
> > 
> > 
> 
> Maxima came to. As her optics - which were once clear blue, were 
now crimson 
> red - flashed brightly. She sat up & swung her new legs over the 
side of the 
> table. Then leapt off the table. 
> 
> Her sleek new form more metallic than the last one, was nearly as 
dangerous 
> as her old style form. 
> 
> She turned to face Perceptor. "You have done well, Perceptor. You 
are to be 
> commended." Her voice this time was less feline & more like her 
old original 
> voice. There was more of her orginal form to this new appearance 
than her 
> previous techno -organic form. 
> 
> Now... at full power & strength.. she was ready for anything. 
> 
> Her optics glanced about, then spotted off into the CR the form of 
Hydras. 
> "Status on Hydras," she asked.
